text: U zotest, ki kitoʙro ʙar tu nozil kard va ʙa'ze az on ojot muhkam hastand, ki ma'onii on vozeh va ravsan ast va onho asli kitoʙ hastand. Va ʙa'ze az on mutasoʙihot hastand, ki ehtimolan ma'onii digar ham dorand. Va ammo kasone, ki dar dilhojason majl ʙa sui ʙotil ast, ʙaroi fitnaangezi va ta'vili nodurusti on, az pasi mutasoʙihot meravand va ta'vili onro cuz Alloh kase namedonad. Va soʙitqadamon dar ilm megujand: "Ba hama ojoti Qur'on imon ovardem, hama az coniʙi Parvardigori most" va cuz xiradmandon pand namepazirand
